A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 4, 2010''', at 22:58 UTC to fix an issue with game sound from the previous version. It was announced, bundled with [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20100104-2154|the previous version]], on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 23:06 UTC.<ref name=":0">[[wordofnotch:316961243|New sound engine implemented]] – The Word of Notch, January 5, 2010</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
*Fixed sound not working.<ref>{{cite IRC log|Adura|file=2010-01-04_#minecraft.log|tz=standard|date=January 4, 2010|"(16:54:56) <Snowman> What's added?"..."(16:55:24) <Notch> sound. but i need to fix it, it seems. :D"..."(18:00:53) <Notch> THERE we go"..."(18:00:57) <Notch> it should work in /indev/ now"}}</ref>
